entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
